questions.question_text: What is one of the purposes of a default Multicast Distribution Tree?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Data MDT is used to offload data from the default.. not the other way around.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/lan/catalyst9500/software/release/17-6/configuration_guide/ip_mcast_rtng/b_176_ip_mcast_rtng_9500_cg/mldp_based_mvpn.html

MLDP creates the MDTs as follows:

 The default MDT uses MP2MP LSPs.
 Supports low bandwidth and control traffic between VRFs.

 The data MDT uses P2MP LSPs.
 Supports a single high-bandwidth source stream from a VRF.
